thread.title: Karen Cook
thread.title_full: Peaches Boutique reviewed by Karen Cook

author: Karen Cook
title: Karen Cook
text: I purchased a dress at another store and they would not take it back or exchange it. I was surfing the net and found Peaches Boutique. Saw the dresses and had to search. Fell head over heels with a dress. Baught it and i couldnt be happier. I will purchase my next dress at Peaches Boutique. Love the return policy and easy to work with.
